channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-1089] Intermittent test failure in groupby_bigdata.q
item.description:
ant test -Dtestcase=TestCliDriver -Dqfile=groupby_bigdata.q

This sometimes fail with out-ot-memory exception in java.
We might want to tweak the default hash table size in map-side aggregation.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
